title: Quick Guide to Writing Essays: Step by Step Guide for Crafting Your Arguments
description: This comprehensive writing guide will help struggling and advanced writers to improve their writing. The guide takes the writer from the beginning, which is the thesis, to the introduction, body, conclusion, editing, MLA, and more. In addition, writers will rid their papers of weak verbs and adjectives while adding flair and precise language. Lastly, writers will improve their sentence structure and ensure each paragraph has a purpose and focus.
author: Dr. Marian Muldrow
